title: Intermagnet MQTT Exchange Format
description: A format for exchanging geomagnetic data in Intermagnet using MQTT

elementsRecorded.description: Listing of geomagnetic field elements recorded in this data (1 character per element)

startDate.description: Date and time of the first data sample, in ISO8601 format, to appropriate precision for the data cadence

cadence.description: The sample period for the data as an ISO8601 duration

publicationLevel.description: The sample period for the data as an ISO8601 duration

ginCode.description: Optional: Code for the GIN that this observatory reports to

decbas.description: Optional: DECBAS (declination baseline) field from IMF format

elevation.description: Optional: Observatory location: elevation in metres

institute.description: Optional: Institute that the observatory belongs to

sensorOrientation.description: Optional: Orientation of the vector magnetic field sensor

digitalSampling.description: Optional: Rate (in seconds) of the data sampling of the vector magnetic field sensor

dataIntervalType.description: Optional: Mean or instantaneous time interval of the data

publicationDate.description: Optional: Date of publication of the data, in ISO8601 format, date only (no time)

standardLevel.description: Optional: Describe whether the data conforms to a standard

standardName.description: Optional: The name of the standard this data conforms to (if any)

standardVersion.description: Optional: The version of the standard this data conforms to (if any)

partialStandDesc.description: Optional: A comma separated list describing the parts of the standard this data conforms to (if any), for use when the standard level is partial

source.description: Optional: Where the data came from

termsOfUse.description: Optional: The terms of use for the data

uniqueIdentifier.description: Optional: A string that can be used to uniquely identify this data, e.g. a DOI

parentIdentifiers.description: Optional: The unique identifer(s) of the parent data set

referenceLinks.description: Optional: URLs pointing to information about the data, one URL per element

comments.description: Optional: Use these to record important information not contained in the defined fields

geomagneticFieldX.description: Magnetic field vector strength in nT, x component, geographic coordinates

geomagneticFieldY.description: Magnetic field vector strength in nT, y component, geographic coordinates

geomagneticFieldZ.description: Magnetic field vector strength in nT, z component, geographic coordinates

geomagneticFieldH.description: Magnetic field vector strength in nT, in the horizontal plane along the magnetic meridian

geomagneticFieldD.description: Angle between the magnetic vector and true north, in degrees of arc, positive east

geomagneticFieldI.description: Angle between the magnetic vector and the horizontal, in degrees of arc, positive below the horizontal

geomagneticFieldF.description: Geomagnetic field strength in nT, calculated from and consistent with XYZ or HDZ field elements

geomagneticFieldS.description: Geomagnetic field strength in nT, measured by an independent scalar instrument
